A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film had its issues\, but overall I was very satisfied with how it played out. Rian Johnson had a goal to break away from the old conventions and push the series forward. I understand that some people were not happy with what happened\, but it's time to let go of nostalgia and let a story be told. As with Empire almost 40 years ago\, this will be a film that takes time to digest and reflect on.
